subtitles.title: Project Description
subtitles.content: Library of Meialia is a 2D rogue-like pixel game developed by Minerva Studio, where the player play as a dragon Almos exploring the ancient library of Meialia to uncover its secrets gradually. The game features 80+ skills, 50+ unique items, 20+ mobs in 4 different environmental biomes, which each having their unique bosses. While still in early access stage, this game has already earned 3000+ players. Actively updating based on user feedback, we are looking for a formal release around June 2026. Steam page at https://store.steampowered.com/app/3102950/Library_of_Meialia/

subtitles.title: My Responsibility
subtitles.content: Due to the nature of small individual studio, I took on multiple roles in the development of Library of Meialia. Other than being the Lead Narrative Designer, I was also responsible for game design, programming, marketing and project management. I collaborated closely with other group leads to ensure a smooth and immersive experience for players in both the battle game flow and the story development. I led the development of the gameâ€™s story, world-building, character development, and dialogue writing. And also the in game tool development and implementation for displaying the storylines. I also actively contributes in level design and enemy design to ensure a cohesive game play experience.
